javadoc: The CommentFieldLocation class contains specific location information within the COMMENTS field of a CodeUnitLocation object.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: addr
params.comment:
address of the location; should not be null
 hierarchy names; this parameter may be null

params.name: componentPath
params.comment:
if not null, it is the array of indexes that point
 to a specific data type inside of another data type

params.name: comment
params.comment: The array of strings that make up the comment

params.name: type
params.comment:
The type of this comment.
                  Can be either CodeUnit.PRE_COMMENT, CodeUnit.POST_COMMENT, 
                  CodeUnit.PLATE_COMMENT, CodeUnit.EOL_COMMENT, or CodeUnit.REPEATABLE_COMMENT.

params.name: row
params.comment: The index of the string that contains the exact location.

params.name: charOffset
params.comment: The position within the string that specifies the exact location.

methods.javadoc:
Default constructor needed for restoring
 a comment field location from XML.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Default constructor needed for restoring
 a comment field location from XML.

methods.javadoc:
Checks that the type is a valid comment type.
@throws IllegalArgumentException if this doesn't have a valid comment type.
methods.name: validateType
methods.comment: Checks that the type is a valid comment type.

methods.javadoc: Returns the array of strings that make up the comment.
methods.name: getComment
methods.comment: Returns the array of strings that make up the comment.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the comment type.  The type is either CodeUnit.EOL_COMMENT,
   CodeUnit.POST_COMMENT, CodeUnit.PLATE_COMMENT, CodeUnit.PRE_COMMENT,
   or CodeUnit.REPEATABLE_COMMENT.
methods.name: getCommentType
methods.comment:
Returns the comment type.  The type is either CodeUnit.EOL_COMMENT,
   CodeUnit.POST_COMMENT, CodeUnit.PLATE_COMMENT, CodeUnit.PRE_COMMENT,
   or CodeUnit.REPEATABLE_COMMENT.

methods.javadoc: Returns a String representation of this location.
methods.name: toString
methods.comment: Returns a String representation of this location.

name: CommentFieldLocation
comment:
The CommentFieldLocation class contains specific location information
 within the COMMENTS field of a CodeUnitLocation object.
